forbidden.name: no-circular
forbidden.comment: Circular dependencies risk runtime issues and hamper refactors.

forbidden.name: backend-handlers-no-aws-sdk-imports
forbidden.comment: Handlers must not import AWS SDK directly; use services/providers.

forbidden.name: backend-services-no-handlers
forbidden.comment: Services expose logic to handlers; they must not import the lambda layer.

forbidden.name: backend-providers-isolated
forbidden.comment: Providers are lowest-level adapters and must not depend on higher layers.

forbidden.name: backend-handlers-no-providers
forbidden.comment: Handlers should resolve dependencies through services instead of talking to providers.

forbidden.name: shared-package-framework-agnostic
forbidden.comment: Shared package must remain framework-agnostic (STANDARDS.md line 64).

forbidden.name: mobile-no-cross-feature-imports
forbidden.comment: Mobile features must not import from each other; use shared/public APIs (STANDARDS.md line 52).

forbidden.name: mobile-screens-layering
forbidden.comment: Mobile screens can only import from features (via /public), components, hooks, lib, services, store, utils (STANDARDS.md line 53).

forbidden.name: mobile-features-no-screens
forbidden.comment: Mobile features must not import from screens (STANDARDS.md line 53).

forbidden.name: mobile-shared-ui-limited-imports
forbidden.comment: Shared UI components can only import from hooks, lib, and utils (STANDARDS.md line 53).

forbidden.name: mobile-hooks-limited-imports
forbidden.comment: Hooks can only import from lib and utils (STANDARDS.md line 53).

forbidden.name: no-lateral-imports
forbidden.comment: No lateral imports between layers (STANDARDS.md line 24).
